values.value: All cheque payments must be issued in favour of “Cycle & Carriage Industries Pte Ltd”. If you are paying in cash, we only accept cash payments of up to S$30,000 per vehicle transaction. You should receive a Cash Acknowledgement Form on the spot; please request from the sales executive if you do not receive it. Please ensure that you receive official receipts for all payments made. Payment for first instalment and insurance premiums are to be made payable to the respective bank and insurance company.
